h3_title: Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Speak to him here, and he'll pass along a Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet for the poor old Loong. You'll also get the formula to make your own Fortifying Medicament for your trouble!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chen_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Chen Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Chen Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Speak to him here, and he'll pass along a Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet for the poor old Loong. You'll also get the formula to make your own Fortifying Medicament for your trouble!
